title: 地皮插件config文件哪个是改地皮钱的
author: haixing
txt_content: 地皮插件config文件哪个是改地皮收费的

replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content:
haixing 发表于 2014-4-25 22:37
Claimprice?
 对 修改那个就可以

replies.author: qwe2298946728
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content:
economy:
      UseEconomy: false
      CanPutOnSale: false
      CanSellToBank: false
      RefundClaimPriceOnReset: false
      RefundClaimPriceOnSetOwner: false
      ClaimPrice: 0.0复制代码最后一行是更改地皮领取价格的

replies.author: haixing
replies.txt_content:
